name: antsCorticalThickness.sh
author: ANTs Developers
description: This script performs T1 anatomical brain processing including brain extraction, brain n-tissue segmentation, cortical thickness estimation, and optional registration to a template.

inputs.name: Image dimension
inputs.description: 2 or 3 for 2- or 3-dimensional image

inputs.name: Anatomical image
inputs.description: Structural intensity image, typically T1.

inputs.name: Brain segmentation template
inputs.description: Anatomical intensity template. This template is not skull-stripped.

inputs.name: Brain extraction probability mask
inputs.description: Brain probability mask in the segmentation template space. A binary mask is acceptable.

inputs.name: Brain segmentation priors
inputs.description: Tissue probability priors corresponding to the template image specified with the -e option. At least four priors must exist, corresponding to CSF, Cortical GM, WM, Subcortical GM.

inputs.name: Output prefix
inputs.description: Output prefix for the generated filenames.

inputs.name: Image file suffix
inputs.description: Any of the standard ITK IO formats e.g. nrrd, nii.gz (default), mhd.

inputs.name: Template for T1 registration
inputs.description: Anatomical intensity template. This template must be skull-stripped.

inputs.name: Extraction registration mask
inputs.description: Binary metric mask defined in the segmentation template space (-e). Only used in brain extraction registration.

inputs.name: Keep temporary files
inputs.description: Keep brain extraction/segmentation warps, etc (default = 0).

inputs.name: Denoise anatomical images
inputs.description: Denoise anatomical images (default = 0).

inputs.name: Max iterations for registration
inputs.description: ANTS registration max iterations (default = 100x100x70x20).

inputs.name: Atropos prior segmentation weight
inputs.description: Atropos spatial prior probability weight for the segmentation (default = 0.25).

inputs.name: Number of segmentation iterations
inputs.description: N4 -> Atropos -> N4 iterations during segmentation (default = 3).

inputs.name: Posterior formulation
inputs.description: Atropos posterior formulation and whether or not to use mixture model proportions. e.g 'Socrates[ 1 ]' (default) or 'Aristotle[ 1 ]'.

inputs.name: Use floating-point precision
inputs.description: Use single float precision in registrations (default = 0).

inputs.name: Use random seeding
inputs.description: Use random number generated from system clock (default = 1).

inputs.name: Use B-spline smoothing
inputs.description: Use B-spline SyN for registrations and B-spline exponential mapping in DiReCT (default = 0).

inputs.name: Cortical thickness prior image
inputs.description: Cortical thickness prior image in the template space, with an estimated upper limit of cortical thickness at each voxel.

inputs.name: Label propagation
inputs.description: Incorporate a distance prior on the posterior formulation.

inputs.name: Additional priors for thickness
inputs.description: Add segmentation classes for thickness estimation.

inputs.name: Use quick registration parameters
inputs.description: Use antsRegistrationSyNQuick.sh for registrations (default = 0).

inputs.name: Atropos iterations
inputs.description: Number of iterations within Atropos (default = 5).

inputs.name: Script stage to run
inputs.description: Which stage of ACT to run (default = 0, run all).

inputs.name: Test / debug mode
inputs.description: If > 0, runs a faster version of the script. Only for testing (default = 0).

output-files.name: Segmentation posteriors
output-files.description: The segmentation posteriors for different tissue classes.
